Title: Income Concentration Analysis with Complex Survey Samples
Authors@R:
c(person("Djalma", "Pessoa", role = "aut"),

Description:
Variance estimation on indicators of income concentration and
poverty using complex sample survey designs. Wrapper around the
'survey' package.
